l4/re/util/vcon_svr

00021 #pragma once
00022 
00023 #include <l4/cxx/ipc_stream>
00024 
00025 namespace L4Re { namespace Util {
00026 
00042 template< typename SVR >
00043 class Vcon_svr
00044 {
00045 public:
00046 
00055   int dispatch(l4_umword_t obj, L4::Ipc::Iostream &ios);
00056 
00057   unsigned vcon_read(char *buf, unsigned size) throw();
00058   void vcon_write(const char *buf, unsigned size) throw();
00059   int vcon_set_attr(l4_vcon_attr_t const *) throw()
00060   { return -L4_EOK; }
00061   int vcon_get_attr(l4_vcon_attr_t *attr) throw()
00062   {
00063     attr->l_flags = attr->o_flags = attr->i_flags = 0;
00064     return -L4_EOK;
00065   }
00066 
00067 private:
00068   SVR const *this_vcon() const { return static_cast<SVR const *>(this); }
00069   SVR *this_vcon() { return static_cast<SVR *>(this); }
00070 };
00071 
00072 template< typename SVR >
00073 int
00074 Vcon_svr<SVR>::dispatch(l4_umword_t, L4::Ipc::Iostream &ios)
00075 {
00076   l4_msgtag_t tag;
00077   ios >> tag;
00078 
00079   if (tag.label() != L4_PROTO_LOG)
00080     return -L4_EBADPROTO;
00081 
00082   L4::Opcode op;
00083   ios >> op;
00084 
00085   switch (op)
00086     {
00087     case L4_VCON_WRITE_OP:
00088         {
00089           unsigned long size = 0;
00090           char *buf = 0;
00091           ios >> L4::Ipc::Buf_in<char>(buf, size);
00092           this_vcon()->vcon_write(buf, size);
00093           return -L4_ENOREPLY;
00094         }
00095     case L4_VCON_SET_ATTR_OP:
00096         {
00097     l4_vcon_attr_t a;
00098     ios.get(a);
00099     return this_vcon()->vcon_set_attr(&a);
00100   }
00101     case L4_VCON_GET_ATTR_OP:
00102         {
00103     l4_vcon_attr_t a;
00104     int e = this_vcon()->vcon_get_attr(&a);
00105     if (e == L4_EOK)
00106       {
00107         ios << l4_umword_t(0);
00108         ios.put(a);
00109       }
00110     return e;
00111   }
00112     default:
00113       break;
00114     }
00115 
00116   unsigned size = op >> 16;
00117 
00118   if (size > (L4_UTCB_GENERIC_DATA_SIZE - 1) * sizeof(l4_utcb_mr()->mr[0]))
00119     size = (L4_UTCB_GENERIC_DATA_SIZE - 1) * sizeof(l4_utcb_mr()->mr[0]);
00120 
00121   char buf[size];
00122   // Hmm, could we avoid the double copy here?
00123   unsigned r = this_vcon()->vcon_read(buf, size);
00124 
00125   // don't use stream operators, because we need to set eof bit!
00126   ios.put(r > size ? size : r | 1UL << 31);
00127   ios.put(buf, size);
00128 
00129   return -L4_EOK;
00130 }
00131 
00132 }}
L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
